body: Dammmmmmmmn the sister too
Bro I usually like rape ones but this was a bit much, especially since the last page is a little confusing and she might have been killed by her own brother.
WTF he also kill the sister
UwU
what a good brother ahhh- wholesome bean
Loved that ending
@Botto Ghetti thank you for your sacrifice of making this account to share that. I'm glad he didn't kill the sister. UwU Kinda surprises me given what the authors works are like lol
aww man, he killed his sister too
oh no i thought it was just the father that was clubbed to death
The dirty could easily be referring to the father, but I now know that I shouldn’t have put so much faith in the author to begin with
what a cute girl hopes she lives a long and fulfilling life 0u0
Did you didn’t saw the « dirty « at the end?

The brother didn’t kill the sister. He swung down on the collapsed father. If you look at the position of the hand, you can see that the bat flew outwards from the girl. I made an account just to say this help me dear god
Well, that's a way to put her out of her misery. Good job
Wow, that kid has some guts, i didn't expect him to also kill the sister
Well done kid. Well done
Her brother probably hated his father too and he thought that she betrayed him and she would become like their father so he goto rid of her before she could end up like their father

Makes no sense to kill the girl at the end, is this the concept of "girls should pure" that japan is so fixeted? Even if it's, why her brother, that probably can't even feel sexual attraction yet, would care about that?

@shadow_king i get where you are coming from, and usually i agree, but look at it like this, this is a different form of art and even if we cant enjoy it in a sexual (or any) way, it stays art we can appreciate. and about the artist not doing anything else, he does what he does well, if circumstances would force him to do something different, looking at how he didnt do anything else up until now, it seems like his heart wouldnt be in it.

(sigh) Why can't this artist make something nice for once? I love the artwork but I can't stand these stories. I mean, sure, I "get" why some people like rape doujins, but why ONLY do those? And the girl gets killed in most of them too! I get it, there are people who get off to that stuff, I'm not judging, but why make that your only type of story. It's a damn shame because those girls are fucking cute. Rape doujins (especially loli rape) bums me out, but these just kinda make me hate life. Sorry for rambling (some might see it as bitching) but it's just a shame, you know?
where is a good site for english guro porn comics? anybody know?
Jealous his dad could fuck her but he couldn't. So he gets his way by bashing him the fk up so he can dominate the little bitch.
Keep calm and read Tsukusun's works. c:
What the fuck? I understand why he killed his dad, but why his sister? She basically got raped and he killed her for being dirty... sonmething tells me the mother left for more than one reason.
So wait, the little bother clubbed the sister at the end because she was dirty? Well...........shit..
Lol, the lil guy was the most fucked up one :D
